verses.roman:
teṣāṁ satata-yuktānāṁ
bhajatāṁ prīti-pūrvakam
dadāmi buddhi-yogaṁ taṁ
yena mām upayānti te

synonyms: teṣām—to them; satata-yuktānām—always engaged; bhajatām—in devotional service; prīti-pūrvakam—in loving ecstasy; dadāmi—I give; buddhi-yogam—real intelligence; tam—that; yena—by which; mām—unto Me; upayānti—come; te—they.
translation: " 'To those who are constantly devoted and worship Me with love, I give the understanding by which they can come to Me.'

purport.content: This is a quotation from Bhagavad-gītā (10.10).
